meta.description: Optimize the logistics operations of GlobalSupply Inc. by selecting distribution centers to open and determining the transportation plan to minimize total costs while meeting the demands of retail stores.

params.name: opening_cost
params.description: Opening costs for each distribution center in dollars

params.name: transport_cost
params.description: Transportation cost per unit from each distribution center to each retail store in dollars

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand of each retail store in units

params.name: supply_capacity
params.description: Supply capacity of each distribution center in units

vars.name: open_center
vars.description: Binary variable indicating whether a distribution center is opened

vars.name: shipment
vars.description: Amount of goods shipped from each distribution center to each retail store

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(opening_cost[c] * open_center[c] for c in CENTERS) + sum(transport_cost[c][s] * shipment[c][s] for c in CENTERS for s in STORES)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost including opening costs of distribution centers and transportation costs

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_1
constraints.description: Ensure demand at store 1 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_2
constraints.description: Ensure demand at store 2 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_3
constraints.description: Ensure demand at store 3 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_4
constraints.description: Ensure demand at store 4 is met

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_5
constraints.description: Ensure demand at store 5 is met

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_1
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 1 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_2
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 2 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_3
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 3 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_4
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 4 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_5
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 5 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_6
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 6 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_7
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 7 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_8
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 8 do not exceed its capacity if opened

constraints.name: supply_capacity_center_9
constraints.description: Ensure shipments from center 9 do not exceed its capacity if opened
